entities.name: fang
entities.description: Fang is described as a boarhound with a bandaged tail.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is introduced as someone who can open a window to talk to others.

relationships.description: Fang is found sitting outside with Hagrid, indicating that Fang is with Hagrid.
Hagrid opens a window to talk to them (implying the students), and Fang is found sitting outside, indicating that Hagrid has contact with Fang.
